sentences.sContent: It reflected an information management the catholicity and the society of the activity.

sentences.sCn: 它反映了信息管理活动的普遍性和社会性。

sentences.sContent: Because of its catholicity and complexity, cavitation is positively researched all over the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because of its catholicity and complexity, cavitation is positively researched all over the world.
sentences.sCn: 由于汽蚀现象的普遍性和复杂性，国内外都在积极进行研究。

sentences.sContent: This problem, there is extensive catholicity in social life.
sentences.sContent_eng: This problem, there is extensive catholicity in social life.
